title: Thanks to our sponsors
subtitle: PyCon Tanzania is generously sponsored by organizations that support its aims. Sponsorship of PyCon gives organizations regional visibility, recognition, and eco-system exposure. It is an excellent way to support the Python language community, the software developers, and the open-source software in Tanzania.
subtitle_1: Each sponsorship opportunity includes the additional benefits as described in the prospects below which are based on the organization's sponsorship.
